item.title: Highscores server help!
item.dc:creator: @ik0u2 ik0u2
item.description:
@ik0u2 wrote:

Well iv setup all the high-scores from the website i just need to set it up with my server and that what im having a problem with, I have the stq.java file and i don’t know what you add in to the folowing :“jdbc:mysql://localhost/highscores”,“root”,“PASSWORD”

Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver").newInstance(); con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost/highscores","root","PASSWORD"); stmt = con.createStatement(); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }

then i know you have to setup other stuff in your server.java and client.java but i don’t know what you add ( I am using a delta source)

Read full topic
